CustomField.description: “Please place the SR request into one out of three Sales Advisory Board´s RAIL categories. Use the below examples:” •Products & Services (electrical, mechanical products, and services, including product updates, features, product video, product upgrades, mandates and product certification) •Operations & Processes (general operations, including processes applicable to more than one product or service, sales tools, sales processes, strategic plans, pricing, etc.) •Marcomm (messaging and related media used for customer communication, including sales collaterals, newsletters, website, etc.)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Products/Services-product/service updates,features,upgrades,mandates,certification Operations/Processes-applicable to more than one product or service,incl. sales tools,training,strategic plans,pricing Marcomm- sales collaterals,newsletters,websites
CustomField.label: Category
